definition: Heaven will not disappoint the person who tries (idiom). If you try hard, you're bound to succeed eventually.
pinyin: Huang2 tian1 bu4 fu4 ku3 xin1 ren2

definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
Heaven never bars one's way (idiom); don't despair and you will find a way through./Never give up hope./Never say die.
pinyin: tian1 wu2 jue2 ren2 zhi1 lu4

definition: to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
bitterness finishes, sweetness begins (idiom); the hard times are over, the good times just beginning
a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
pinyin: you3 zhi4 zhe3 shi4 jing4 cheng2

definition: to gain nothing/to end up empty-handed
Thank heavens!/Thank goodness that's worked out so well!

pinyin: jiu3 niu2 er4 hu3 zhi1 li4

definition: to travel far and wide looking for sth, only to find it easily
pinyin: ta4 po4 tie3 xie2 wu2 mi4 chu4 , de2 lai2 quan2 bu4 fei4 gong1 fu5
related.word: 踏破铁鞋无觅处，得来全不费工夫

definition: to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
the road to happiness is strewn with setbacks (idiom)
